about.title: ABOUT
about.description: 23-year-old developer working since 2020 on various projects and companies. Currently working as a Full Stack developer focusing on TypeScript, Go, Java, Docker, AWS and databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB.
about.stacks: TypeScript, Go, Java, Docker, AWS, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB
